page.title: 13SHOPS
page.content: {The village bakery and shop}is 80 years old. Mrs Rolfe who owns the shop has been making bread for about 30 years. Mr and Mrs Rolfe started making bread because it was the family trade. They can bake as many as 300 loaves of bread a day.The bread is also sold to other small shops. In the bakery Mr and Mrs Rolfe also bake cakes, rolls, baps, french sticks, sausage rolls and meat pasties. They start making bread at half past 4 in the morning. They use fresh yeast to make their bread. The shop also sells newspapers, groceries, milk, haberdashery, garden seeds and ice cream. The shop was built in 1845.
